text: Abbotsford House near the town of Melrose in Roxburghshire in Scotland was the house of the writer Sir Walter Scott, where he lived from 1812 to 1832. He wrote a lot of historical adventure stories, many of which have been filmed for the cinema and television. The house is now a museum dedicated to Scott's life and works. It is a category A listed building. Category:Buildings and structures in Scotland
title: Abbotsford House
